__e: It is you that must end the attacks by ending the droid occupation.
Remember when you were a kid and you felt like anything was possible, and then you grew up, and things didn't turn out like you planned, but still there was that part inside of you that would dream.
In fact, you were fired two years ago.
You were all created by Malcolm as a child.
And when your hard heart made you like unto the stone and broke you from His body, which is the stars, and the wind between the stars, He knew you!
You've been saved by that fire god you like to mock.
